---
name: Security report
about: Report a security vulnerability
title: '[SECURITY] '
labels: security
assignees: ''

---

**⚠️ DO NOT REPORT SECURITY VULNERABILITIES PUBLICLY ⚠️**

For security vulnerabilities, please email them directly to:
security@yourapp.com

Please include:
- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (if known)

We will respond as soon as possible and work with you to address the issue.
